## Properties

| Property    | Attribute     | Description                                 | Type      | Default    |
| ----------- | ------------- | ------------------------------------------- | --------- | ---------- |
| `axleX`     | `axle-x`      |                                             | `string`  | `'right'`  |
| `axleY`     | `axle-y`      |                                             | `string`  | `'bottom'` |
| `isSubMenu` | `is-sub-menu` | isSubMenu. Used toselect type of item list. | `boolean` | `false`    |
| `open`      | `open`        | Open. Used to open/close the dropdown.      | `boolean` | `false`    |


## Events

| Event       | Description                                     | Type               |
| ----------- | ----------------------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `bdsToggle` | bdsToggle. Event to return selected date value. | `CustomEvent<any>` |
